en.name: Booster Roasted Coffee
en.description: Experience the rich and bold flavor of our Booster Roasted Coffee. Carefully selected beans roasted to perfection, delivering a smooth and energizing cup every time.
features: Perfect for espresso and drip brewing

reviews.title: Best coffee I've ever had!
reviews.comment: This coffee is absolutely amazing. The chocolate notes are perfect and it gives me the energy boost I need every morning. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.title: Great value for money
reviews.comment: Really good coffee at a reasonable price. The roast is consistent and the flavor is rich. Only gave 4 stars because I prefer a slightly darker roast.

reviews.title: Perfect for my morning routine
reviews.comment: Smooth, rich, and never bitter. I've tried many brands but this one is my favorite. The caramel notes are subtle but delicious.

en.name: Premium Arabica Coffee Beans
en.description: Premium Arabica coffee beans carefully sourced and roasted to deliver a smooth, rich flavor with every cup.
features: Ideal for espresso and filter coffee

en.name: Dark Roast Espresso
en.description: A bold dark roast espresso blend with deep flavors and a strong aroma, perfect for espresso lovers.

en.name: Colombian Medium Roast
en.description: A smooth Colombian medium roast coffee with a balanced taste and a pleasant aroma.

en.name: Ethiopian Single Origin Coffee
en.description: A premium Ethiopian single-origin coffee known for its floral aroma and bright fruity notes.

en.name: Organic Fair Trade Coffee
en.description: Organic fair trade coffee made from responsibly sourced beans for a clean and ethical coffee experience.

en.name: Premium French Roast
en.description: A premium French roast coffee with a smoky flavor and rich body, perfect for strong coffee lovers.

en.name: Light Breakfast Roast
en.description: A light breakfast roast coffee with a bright, refreshing flavor perfect for starting your day.

en.name: Luxury Coffee Gift Box
en.description: A luxury coffee gift box featuring premium coffee selections, perfect for special occasions and gifting.

en.name: Eco-Friendly Coffee Bags
en.description: Eco-friendly coffee bags made from sustainable materials, designed to keep coffee fresh while reducing environmental impact.

en.name: Vacuum Sealing Packaging
en.description: Advanced vacuum sealing solution to keep coffee fresh for a longer time and prevent flavor loss.

en.name: Luxury Gift Box Set
en.description: A premium gift box set for coffee lovers, perfect for special occasions and elegant gifting.

en.name: Professional Espresso Machine
en.description: A professional espresso machine that delivers cafÃ©-quality coffee at home with precise control and high performance.
features: Suitable for home and cafÃ© use

en.name: Manual Coffee Grinder
en.description: High-quality manual coffee grinder for freshly grinding coffee beans to your preferred consistency.

en.name: Deluxe French Press
en.description: An elegant French press for brewing rich, full-bodied coffee with ease and style.

en.name: Pour Over Coffee Kit
en.description: A complete pour-over coffee kit designed for specialty coffee enthusiasts who value precision and flavor.
